thread.title: Community Trust Bancorp, Inc. Declares Its Cash Dividend

author: cnbc.com
title: Community Trust Bancorp, Inc. Declares Its Cash Dividend
text:
PIKEVILLE, Ky.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- On January 23, 2018, Community Trust Bancorp, Inc., (NASDAQ: CTBI) declared its cash dividend of $0.33 per share, which will be paid on April 1, 2018, to shareholders of record on March 15, 2018.
Community Trust Bancorp, Inc., with assets of $4.1 billion, is headquartered in Pikeville, Kentucky and has 70 banking locations across eastern, northeastern, central, and south central Kentucky, six banking locations in southern West Virginia, four banking locations in northeastern Tennessee, four trust offices across Kentucky, and one trust office in Tennessee.
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180126005679/en/
Community Trust Bancorp, Inc.
Jean R. Hale, 606-437-3294
Chairman, President & CEO
Source: Community Trust Bancorp, Inc.
